title: Group Therapy: The Smoking Neighbors
description: A listener moved into an apartment complex that isn't very big so everyone knows each other.  Now she's dealing with an issue where one of her neighbors is smoking inside and it's getting into her apartment.  Her daughter has asthma so now she's trying to figure out how to approach the situation without having bad blood with her new neighbor.
